title: Refactor pybind_state
body_html:
Summary:
pybind_state.cc was in quite a poor state, with far too many different things living inside it

This diff

  • adds a registry to allow .cc's to independently update the python bindings when compiled in
  • creates a python global workspace singleton (please review this part heavily :) ) for use in the newly factored out files
  • factors out the blob feeders and fetchers into their own file
  • factors out the two addGlobalMethods and addObjectMethods functions into their own file
  • factors out background plan into its own file
  • factors out python_detail:: namespace into its own file
  • cleans up some small things I found on the way

Differential Revision: D9430438

Summary:
pybind_state.cc was in quite a poor state, with far too many different things living inside it

This diff
- adds a registry to allow .cc's to independently update the python bindings when compiled in
- creates a python global workspace singleton (please review this part heavily :) ) for use in the newly factored out files
- factors out the blob feeders and fetchers into their own file
- factors out the two addGlobalMethods and addObjectMethods functions into their own file
- factors out background plan into its own file
- factors out python_detail:: namespace into its own file
